summary: Add all crafting equipments to Nightingale Hall.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Georgia][color=#ea9999][size=5][b]A little Improvement in Nightingale Hall[/b][/size][/color][/font]

[size=3]  There is only poor travel base around Riften.
  Especially smelter is only in Shor's Stone or Fort Dawnguard. It's too far, quite inconvenient !
  So I decieded to carry in whole crafting equipments to Nightingale Hall.[/size]

[color=#f9cb9c][size=4][u][b]Added Equipments[/b][/u][/size][/color]
[list]
[*][size=3]2 Barrels (No respawn)[/size]
[*][size=3]2 Sacks (No respawn)[/size]
[*][size=3]Bedroll[/size]
[*][size=3]Bench[/size]
[*][size=3]Cooking Pot[/size]
[*][size=3]Tanning Rack[/size]
[*][size=3]Anvil[/size]
[*][size=3]Smelter (Well ventilated!)[/size]
[*][size=3]Grindstone[/size]
[*][size=3]Workbench[/size]
[*][size=3]Wood Chopping Block[/size]
[*][size=3]Alchemy Labs[/size]
[*][size=3]Arcane Enchanter[/size]
[/list]
[color=#f9cb9c][size=4][u][b]Compatibility[/b][/u][/size][/color]
[list]
[*][size=3]Can use both before/after "Darkness Returns". (Through this quest, some interior will be changed)[/size]
[*][size=3]There may be no conflict with other mods of this area.[/size]
[/list]
[u][color=#f9cb9c][size=4][b]Recommendation[/b][/size][/color][color=#3c78d8]
[/color][/u][size=3]  After finish "Blindsighted", keep the "Key" in your hand and forget about the troublesome Daedra lady.
  Leaving "Darkness Returns" unfinished, the dark elf lass will stay in the far cave.
  Here, this hideout will be completely yours! [/size]
author: Pumpkin Pie
